Key Match Events: David Miller and Aiden Markram take South Africa up on the point chart by defeating India.
South Africa need 6 runs off 6 balls with 3 wickets in hand.
Ashwin takes a wicket as SA need 12 runs off 14 balls.
David Miller hits two sixes in a row in Ashwin's spell. SA need 12 runs off 15 balls.
Aiden Markram hits a six off Ashwin.
David Miller smashes a 104-metre-long sixer to Ashwin.
Virat Kohli drops Markram's catch in Ashwin's over. SA 65/3 (12).
David Miller pulls off boundaries. SA 56/3 (11).
Skipper Rohit Sharma misses hitting the wickets in a possible run out!
Skipper Rohit Sharma drops Markram's catch in Ashwin's over. SA 65/3 (12).
